resources.string:
v1.0.06.03

 v1.9.06.02
 Location Fixes:
 Fairfield County, CT
 Columbia County, PA
 Hood River, OR
 Williamson County, TX
 Box Elder County, UT
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed some bugs in the new run time permission logic.
 Force close while generating support emails.
 
 v1.9.06.01
 Implemented new Android 6.0 run time permission and auto backup features.
 
 Response buttons can be individually configured to make a phone call or send a text message. And text responses can now be directed to any phone number.
 
 New Location:
 Teton County, ID
 
 Location Fixes:
 Greene County, MO
